title: Inconsistent argument names in Linear and Conv layers
body_html: Linear layers accept in_features and out_features arguments, and save them as similarly named instance variables. Similar arguments for Conv1d/Conv2d/Conv3d layers are called in_channels and out_channels. I think its worth to standardize on one set of names.

body: Linear layers accept `in_features` and `out_features` arguments, and save them as similarly named instance variables. Similar arguments for Conv1d/Conv2d/Conv3d layers are called `in_channels` and `out_channels`. I think its worth to standardize on one set of names.
